'''Radiant Spincrystal 64''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Island of Crystal and Pearl]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It has a chance to be sold by the [[Teapot Traveling Salesman]]. It can only be purchased after completing the {{Quest|Ritou Escape Plan}}.
